sys_ux_data_broker_composite.description: Stream of data objects composited from multiple sources (i.e. different database and virtual tables), provided as View objects for rendering in a list, content set, or other multi-item presentation
sys_ux_data_broker_composite.name: Search EVAM Data Resource
sys_ux_data_broker_composite.props: [ { "name": "searchEvamConfigId", "label": "Evam Config ID of Search Results", "description": "Evam Config ID of Search Results", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "reference", "mandatory": true, "typeMetadata": { "reference": "sys_ux_composite_data" } }, { "name": "searchContextConfigId", "label": "Search Context Config ID", "description": "Search Context Config ID", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "reference", "mandatory": true, "typeMetadata": { "reference": "sys_search_context_config" } }, { "name": "searchTerm", "label": "Search Term", "description": "Search Term", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "facetFilters", "label": "Facet Filters", "description": "Facet Filters", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "searchFilters", "label": "Search Filters", "description": "Search Filters", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": "" }, { "name": "disableSpellCheck", "label": "Disable Spell Checking", "description": "A boolean to disable spell checking", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "boolean", "mandatory": true, "defaultValue": false }, { "name": "paginationToken", "label": "Pagination Token", "description": "Pagination Token", "readOnly": false, "fieldType": "string", "defaultValue": "" } ]
